description: Creates a new generic library project in the current workspace.
title: Library Options Schema

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

___lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the library.

___prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

___skipInstall.description: When true, does not install dependency packages.

___skipPackageJson.description: When true, does not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

___entryFile.description: The path at which to create the library's public API file, relative to the workspace root.

___skipTsConfig.description: When true, does not update "tsconfig.json" to add a path mapping for the new library. The path mapping is needed to use the library in an app, but can be disabled here to simplify development.
